snippet: About 50 gunmen in military uniforms burst into the offices of four independent newspapers in Baghdad, stabbing and beating employees, staff members and officials said Tuesday.
abstract: About 50 gunmen in military uniforms burst into offices of four independent newspapers in Baghdad, stabbing and beating employees; attackers are reportedly angry over article accusing cleric Mahmoud al-Sarkhi of trying to dominate Shiite holy city of Karbala.
lead_paragraph: About 50 gunmen in military uniforms burst into the offices of four independent newspapers in Baghdad, stabbing and beating employees, staff members and officials said Tuesday.
